code: import axios from'axios';var baseUrl='http://localhost:3001/api/reservas';var token=null;var setToken=function setToken(newToken){token="Bearer ".concat(newToken);};var getAll=function getAll(){var request=axios.get(baseUrl);return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};var getHabitacion=function getHabitacion(habitacion){var config={headers:{Authorization:token}};var request=axios.get("".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(habitacion),config);return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};var create=function create(newObject){var config={headers:{Authorization:token}};var request=axios.post(baseUrl,newObject,config);return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};var update=function update(id,newObject){var config={headers:{Authorization:token}};var request=axios.put("".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(id),newObject,config);return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};var erase=function erase(id){var config={headers:{Authorization:token}};var request=axios.delete("".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(id),config);return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};export default{getAll:getAll,getHabitacion:getHabitacion,create:create,update:update,erase:erase,setToken:setToken};
